long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Edwisor Screen Share:

This extension is the magic wand to share your screen content with all the edwisorians:)


★ Hello, edwisorians:

  Ensure, you have this extension installed within your browser so that you 
  enjoy an uninterrupted live session and the one-to-one session with our 
  mentors. In many cases, the mentor might ask you to share your screen. In 
  that case, you gonna need this extension.


★ If you are the awesome mentor we always talk about at edwisor.com:

  You need this extension to show your browser screen to the students or you 
  might want to show them how fast you can write the awesome piece of code or 
  you might need to show the student which part of their project you love.
  That cannot be done until you have this tiniest friend installed within your 
  browser.
